channel.title: Vsphere -RWM persistance volume claim for kubenetes HA set up --file share level is good enough for RWM or do we need to have RWM for block volume as well
channel.description: We are setting up HA using kubernetes in vpshere , we are having issues with PVC(persitence volume claims) , as vsphere doesnt support RWM. so just want to check, File share level is good enough for RWM or do we need to have RWM for block volume as well

item.title: Vsphere -RWM persistance volume claim for kubenetes HA set up --file share level is good enough for RWM or do we need to have RWM for block volume as well
item.dc:creator: bigmstone
item.description:

item.title: Vsphere -RWM persistance volume claim for kubenetes HA set up --file share level is good enough for RWM or do we need to have RWM for block volume as well
item.dc:creator: udaymadupathi31
item.description:
We are setting up HA using kubernetes in vpshere , we are having issues with PVC(persitence volume claims)
, as vsphere doesnt support RWM. so just want to check, File share level is good enough for RWM or do we need to have RWM for block volume as well
